name: Christian Solidarity Worldwide
membership:
Human Rights and Democracy Network (HRDN)
European Platform on Religious Intolerance and Discrimination (EPRID)
goal:
Christian Solidarity Worldwide (CSW) is a human rights organisation working for freedom of religion or belief through advocacy and research.

CSW exists to redress injustice and stand in solidarity and partnership with those facing discrimination and/or persecution due to their religion or belief.
interests: Borders and Security, Culture, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives:
Human Rights activities
Parliamentary resolutions
Parliamentary committees
Trade agreements with third countries
Development activities
